Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 25th overall pick, by West Texas in 1975...
Injured on 7/11/1977 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/17/1978, off Gregory Johnson (DIA)...

Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 5/12/1981...
